message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about the behavior of squirrels and their preparation for winter. Squirrels gather nuts in the fall to store them for the winter months when food becomes scarce. Option (A) is the correct answer because squirrels gather nuts before the arrival of winter in December. Options (B), (C), and (D) are unrelated to the behavior of squirrels during the change of seasons.
